string.text: Gives gold to the adopted hero
How much gold to give the adopted hero
Allows viewer to 'adopt' a hero in game - the hero name will change to the viewers name, and they can control it with further commands
Couldn't find your hero, did you adopt one yet?
Could not find the clan with the name {name}
Create a new hero instead of adopting an existing one (they will be a wanderer at a random tavern)
Allow noble heroes (if CreateNew is false)
Allow wanderer heroes (if CreateNew is false)
Allow companions (not tested, if CreateNew is false)
Only allow heroes from same faction as player
Create desired clan if it doesn't exist

What criteria the viewer selects via text input (make sure to enable 'Is User Input Required' it in the Reward Specification > Misc section if you set this to something other than None). Faction selection is not compatible with Allow Wanderer, as wanderers do not have a faction until they are recruited.
What fraction of assets will be inherited when a new character is adopted after an old one died (0 to 1)
How many custom items can be inherited
Only viewers who have been subscribers for at least this many months can adopt, ignored if not specified
Gold the adopted hero will start with
Random range of age when overriding it
Starting skills, if empty then default skills of the adopted hero will be left in tact
Equipment tier the adopted hero will start with, if you don't specify then they get the heroes existing equipment
If the rebellion can only occur against the player.
Cannot rebel while not under the player kingdom
Can't declare war the player is not the ruler of his kingdom or is not in a kingdom
Cannot declare war on a member of your clan
You already are the ruling clan
You separated from {oldBoss} and declared war to his Kingdom
You cannot rebel because the player is not in a kingdom
Cannot rebel you are not in a kingdom
Cannot rebel you are not the leader of your clan
Is the user able to choose the faction he want to join if disabled default faction is player faction
Can heroes already in a kingdom leave it to join the new kingdom
You are not the leader of your clan
Could not find the kingdom or player is not the ruler of a kingdom
You are a wanderer you cannot join a kingdom
OnlyIndependants is enabled you cannot leave your kingdom to join another
You are now a vassal of the {king} kingdom
Allow viewer to adjust characteristics about their Hero
Only allow swapping gender for heroes that are created, instead of adopted
You cannot manage your hero, as a mission is active!
You cannot manage your hero, as you are a prisoner!
Changing heroes gender is not enabled
Changing heroes gender is only enabled for created heroes
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to change gender
Your hero has changed their gender to female
{Name} has changed their gender to female!
Your hero has changed their gender to male
{Name} has changed their gender to male!
Allow viewer to change their clan or make leader decisions
Maximum heroes (includes NPC's) before join is disallowed
Allow viewers to join the players clan
Toggle whether or not trying to lead a clan already led by a BLT hero is possible - random chance they win based on skill difference
You cannot manage your clan, as a mission is active!
You cannot manage your clan, as you are a prisoner!
You are not in a clan
Invalid or empty clan action, try (join/create/lead/rename/stats)
You cannot join another clan as you are the leader of your clan
Could not find the clan with the name {name}
Joining the players clan is disabled
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to join a clan
You cannot create another clan as you are the leader of your clan
A clan with the name {name} already exists
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to create a clan
{heroName} has created and is leading clan {clanName}!
You are not in a clan
You cannot lead the players clan
You are already the leader of your clan
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to lead a clan
Leading clans led by other BLT Heroes is disabled
You have been bested in battle by {oldLeader} and failed to lead your clan
{heroName} has usurped {oldLeader} and is now leading clan {clanName}!
You have successfully taken over the leadership of your clan
You are now the leader of your clan
You are not the leader of your clan
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to rename a clan
You are not in a clan
Allow viewer to change their clans Kingdom or make leader decisions
Maximum clans (includes NPC's) before join is disallowed
Allow viewers to join the players kingdom
Enable viewer clan rebelling against their kingdom
Minimum clan tier to start a rebellion
You cannot manage your kingdom, as a mission is active!
You cannot manage your kingdom, as you are a prisoner!
You cannot manage your kingdom, as you are not in a clan
Your clan is not in a Kingdom
Your clan {clanName} is a member of the kingom {kingdomName}
Invalid or empty kingdom action, try (join/rebel/stats)
Your clan is already in a kingdom, in order to leave you must rebel against them
You cannot manage your kingdom, as you are not your clans leader!
Could not find the kingdom with the name {name}
Joining the players kingdom is disabled
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to join a kingdom
Your clan {clanName} has joined the kingom {kingdomName}
Your clan is not in a kingdom
You cannot lead a rebellion agaisnt your kingdom, as you are not your clans leader!
You already are the ruling clan
Your clan is not high enough tier to rebel
You do not have enough gold ({price}) to start a rebellion
Your clan has rebelled against {oldBoss} and declared war
Your clan is not in a kingdom
Error could not find a clan with the name {clanName}
{Inheritance}% of gold spent on equipment and retinue
You have already adopted a hero!
You must be subscribed for at least {MinSubscribedMonths} months to adopt a hero with this command!
You must be subscribed to adopt a hero with this command!
Please enter one of {Cultures} when adopting
Please enter part of the name of the faction you wish to join
Please enter the name of the clan you wish to join
Please enter the name and clan of the leader you wish to adopt separated with /
No hero is available: player is not in a faction (disable Player Faction Only, or join a faction)!
You can't adopt a hero: no available hero matching the requirements was found!
{OldName} is now known as {NewName}, they have {NewGold} (inheriting {Inherited})!
{OldName} is now known as {NewName}, they have {NewGold}!
If set a random attribute is improved, otherwise the viewer should provide part of the name of the attribute to improve (this works best as a chat command)
Provide the attribute name (or part of it) when calling this
Couldn't improve any attributes, they are all at max level!
Provide the attribute name to improve (or part of it)
You have gained {Amount} points in {Attribute}, you now have {NewAmount}!
You have gained a point in {Attribute}, you now have {NewAmount}!
Couldn't improve {Attribute} attribute, it is already at max level!
Allows viewers to auction custom items, for other viewers to bid on (make sure to add a bid command also)
How long the auction should last before the highest bidder wins
Interval at which to output a reminder of the auction
Another auction is already in progress
You have no items to auction
{ItemCount} items found matching '{ItemName}', be more specific
Auction of '{ItemName}' is OPEN! Reserve price is {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}, bidding closes in {AuctionDurationInSeconds} seconds.
Allows viewers bid on an active custom item auction (make sure to add an auction command also)
Allow improvement of adopted heroes who are also companions of the player.
Whether to re-equip the equipment INSTEAD of upgrading it (you should make TWO commands, one to upgrade and one to reequip)
Re-rolls your equipment at your current tier
You are a player companion, you cannot change your own equipment!
You cannot upgrade equipment, as a mission is active!
Add focus points to heroes skills
What skill to add focus to
Chooses a random skill to add focus to, preferring class skills, then skills for current equipment, then other skills. Skills setting is ignored when auto is used.
Automatic, based on class, equipment, and existing skills
Couldn't find a valid skill to add focus points to!
You have gained {Amount} focus points in {Skill}, you now have {NewAmount}!
You have gained a focus point in {Skill}, you now have {NewAmount}!
Allows viewers to discard one of their own custom items
You have no items to discard
{Count} items found matching '{Args}', be more specific
Allows viewers to give one of their own custom items to another viewer
You have no items to give
Will write various hero stats to chat
Show personal info: health, location, age
Shows skills (and focuse values) above the specified MinSkillToShow value
If ShowTopSkills is specified, this defines what skills are shown
Shows the equipment tier of the hero
Shows the full battle inventory of the hero
Shows the heroes storage (all their custom items)
Shows the full civilian inventory of the hero
Shows a summary of the retinue of the hero (count and tier)
Shows the exact classes and counts of the retinue of the hero
Shows all hero tracked stats (kills, deaths, summons, attacks, tournament wins etc.)
Lower bound of amount to improve
Upper bound of amount to improve
Gold that will be taken from the hero
Puts adopted heroes in queue for the next tournament
Allow viewer to name custom items
Add and improve adopted heroes retinue
Whether this action should attempt to buy/upgrade as many times as possible when called with no parameter.
You cannot upgrade retinue, as a mission is active!
The price to pay to rejuvenate
The amount of years you will rejuvenate
You cannot rejuvenate, as a mission is active!
You cannot rejuvenate bellow child age
Your rejuvenated of {Age} years you are now {newAge}
Retires the hero, allowing the viewer to adopt another (if that is enabled)
You must enter '{Prompt}' at the prompt to retire your hero
You cannot retire your hero, as a mission is active!
Allows changing the 'class' of an adopted hero, which affects the equipment and where XP is applied
If this is free when the hero does not have a class already (this can only happen if Adopt does NOT specify a default class)
Gold cost for Tier 1 class change
Gold cost for Tier 2 class change
Gold cost for Tier 3 class change
Gold cost for Tier 4 class change
Gold cost for Tier 5 class change
Gold cost for Tier 6 class change
Whether to immediately update equipment after changing class
Free if you do not already have a class
Updates equipment to match new class
You cannot change class, as a mission is active!
Chooses a random skill to add XP to, preferring class skills, then skills for current equipment, then other skills. Skills setting is ignored when auto is used.
Automatic, based on class, equipment, and existing skills
Couldn't find a skill to improve
Spawns the adopted hero into the current active mission
Whether this summon is allowed when no vanilla troops are left, only applies to battles and sieges
Can summon for normal field battles between parties
Can summon in the hideout missions
Whether the hero is on the player or enemy side
Which formation to add summoned heroes to (only applies to ones without a specified class)
Multiplier applied to (positive) effects for subscribers
HP the hero gets every second they are alive in the mission
You cannot be summoned now, this mission does not allow it!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission has not started yet!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission is ending!
You cannot be summoned, you are already here!
You cannot be summoned now, the mission has not started yet!
You cannot switch sides, you traitor!
You cannot be summoned, you DIED!
You cannot be summoned, you are already here!
You cannot be summoned, your side is depleted!
You cannot be summoned, your party is already here!
Could not find a party for you to join!
Text that will be displayed in game
Higher weight means more chance this shout is used
Can be used when summoning on player side
Can be used when summoning on enemy side
Can be used in situations other than battle/siege
Can be used when in a field battle
Can be used when on siege defender side
Can be used when on siege attacker side
Allows activation of the adopted heroes class active powers
You don't have a class, so no powers are available!
You cannot activate your powers now: {FailReason}!
Config Error: Can't create new hero and have random selection filters
Please enter the name of the faction you wish to adopt a hero from
Please enter the name of the leader you wish to adopt
Error could not find a clan with the name {clanName}
